verses.verse: Then <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H7206>Reubenites<s%>, and the <S%H1425>Gadites<s%>, and the <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>,

And <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H8104>them<s%>, You have kept all that <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H8085>you<s%>, and have obeyed my <S%H6963>voice<s%> in all that I commanded <S%H6680>you<s%>:

You have not <S%H5800>left<s%> your <S%H251>brothers<s%> these <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>, but have <S%H8104>kept<s%> the <S%H4931>charge<s%> of the <S%H4687>commandment<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>.

And now the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has given <S%H5117>rest<s%> unto your <S%H251>brothers<s%>, as he <S%H1696>promised<s%> <S%H6437>them<s%>: therefore now return <S%H3212>you<s%>, and get you unto your <S%H168>tents<s%>, and unto the <S%H776>land<s%> of your <S%H272>possession<s%>, which <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> you on the other <S%H5676>side<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>.

But take <S%H3966>diligent<s%> <S%H8104>care<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> the <S%H4687>commandment<s%> and the <S%H8451>law<s%>, which <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H157>you<s%>, to love the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, and to <S%H3212>walk<s%> in all his <S%H1870>ways<s%>, and to <S%H8104>keep<s%> his <S%H4687>commandments<s%>, and to <S%H1692>cleave<s%> unto <S%H5647>him<s%>, and to serve him with all your <S%H3824>heart<s%> and with all your <S%H5315>soul<s%>.
So <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> <S%H7971>them<s%>, and sent them away: and they <S%H3212>went<s%> unto their <S%H168>tents<s%>.

Now to the one <S%H2677>half<s%> of the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> had <S%H5414>given<s%> possession in <S%H1316>Bashan<s%>: but unto the other <S%H2677>half<s%> there <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H5973>among<s%> their <S%H251>brothers<s%> on this <S%H5676>side<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> <S%H3220>westward<s%>. And when <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> sent them <S%H7971>away<s%> also unto their <S%H168>tents<s%>, then he blessed <S%H1288>them<s%>,

And he <S%H559>spoke<s%> unto <S%H559>them<s%>, saying, <S%H7725>Return<s%> with <S%H7227>much<s%> <S%H5233>riches<s%> unto your <S%H168>tents<s%>, and with <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7227>much<s%> <S%H4735>cattle<s%>, with <S%H3701>silver<s%>, and with <S%H2091>gold<s%>, and with <S%H5178>brass<s%>, and with <S%H1270>iron<s%>, and with <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7235>much<s%> <S%H8008>clothes<s%>: <S%H2505>divide<s%> the <S%H7998>plunder<s%> of your <S%H341>enemies<s%> with your <S%H251>brothers<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> and the <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%>, and <S%H3212>departed<s%> from the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> out of <S%H7887>Shiloh<s%>, which is in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>, to <S%H3212>go<s%> unto the <S%H776>country<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>, to the <S%H776>land<s%> of their <S%H272>possession<s%>, whereof they were <S%H270>possessed<s%>, according to the <S%H6310>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses<s%>.

And when they <S%H935>came<s%> unto the <S%H1552>borders<s%> of <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>, that are in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>, the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> and the <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> there an <S%H4196>altar<s%> by <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>, a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4196>altar<s%> to see <S%H4758>to<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H559>say<s%>, <S%H1121>Behold<s%>, the sons of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> and the <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> have <S%H1129>built<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> over <S%H4136>against<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>, in the <S%H1552>borders<s%> of <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>, at the <S%H5676>passage<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And when the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> of <S%H5712>it<s%>, the whole congregation of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> gathered themselves <S%H6950>together<s%> at <S%H7887>Shiloh<s%>, to go <S%H5927>up<s%> to war against <S%H6635>them<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> unto the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%>, and to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%>, and to the <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>, into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>, <S%H6372>Phinehas<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>,

And with him <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H5387>princes<s%>, of <S%H259>each<s%> <S%H5387>chief<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> a <S%H1>prince<s%> throughout all the <S%H4294>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; and each <S%H376>one<s%> was an <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%> among the <S%H505>thousands<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And they <S%H935>came<s%> unto the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%>, and to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%>, and to the <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>, unto the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>, and they <S%H1696>spoke<s%> with <S%H559>them<s%>, saying,

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the whole <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, What <S%H4604>trespass<s%> is this that you have <S%H4603>committed<s%> against the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, to turn <S%H7725>away<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%> from <S%H310>following<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, in that you have <S%H1129>built<s%> you an <S%H4196>altar<s%>, that you might <S%H4775>rebel<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%> against the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>?

Is the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of <S%H6465>Peor<s%> too <S%H4592>little<s%> for <S%H2891>us<s%>, from which we are not cleansed until this <S%H3117>day<s%>, although there was a <S%H5063>plague<s%> in the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>,

But that you must turn <S%H7725>away<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%> from <S%H310>following<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>? and it will <S%H4775>be<s%>, seeing you rebel to <S%H3117>day<s%> against the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, that to <S%H4279>morrow<s%> he will be <S%H7107>angry<s%> with the whole <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

<S%H389>Nevertheless<s%>, if the <S%H776>land<s%> of your <S%H272>possession<s%> be <S%H2931>unclean<s%>, then pass you <S%H5674>over<s%> unto the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H272>possession<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, where the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>'s <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> <S%H7931>dwells<s%>, and take <S%H270>possession<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> <S%H4775>us<s%>: but rebel not against the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, <S%H408>nor<s%> <S%H4775>rebel<s%> against <S%H1129>us<s%>, in building you an <S%H4196>altar<s%> <S%H1107>beside<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%>.

Did not <S%H5912>Achan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2226>Zerah<s%> <S%H4603>commit<s%> a <S%H4604>trespass<s%> in the accursed <S%H2764>thing<s%>, and <S%H7110>wrath<s%> <S%H1961>fell<s%> on all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>? and that <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H1478>perished<s%> not <S%H259>alone<s%> in his <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>.

Then the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> and the <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%>, and <S%H1696>said<s%> unto the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H505>thousands<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>,

The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> of <S%H430>gods<s%>, the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> of <S%H430>gods<s%>, he <S%H3045>knows<s%>, and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> he shall <S%H3045>know<s%>; if it be in <S%H4777>rebellion<s%>, or if in <S%H4604>transgression<s%> against the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, <S%H3467>(save<s%> us not this <S%H3117>day<s%>,)

That we have <S%H1129>built<s%> us an <S%H4196>altar<s%> to <S%H7725>turn<s%> from <S%H310>following<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, or if to <S%H5927>offer<s%> on it burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> or food <S%H4503>offering<s%>, or if to <S%H6213>offer<s%> <S%H8002>peace<s%> <S%H2077>offerings<s%> on <S%H3068>it<s%>, let the Lord himself require <S%H1245>it<s%>;

And if we have not rather <S%H6213>done<s%> it for <S%H1674>fear<s%> of this <S%H1697>thing<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, In time to <S%H4279>come<s%> your <S%H1121>sons<s%> might <S%H559>speak<s%> unto our <S%H1121>sons<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, What have you to do with the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>?

For the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H5414>made<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> a <S%H1366>border<s%> between us and <S%H1121>you<s%>, you sons of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> and <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%>; you have no <S%H2506>part<s%> in the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>: so shall your <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H7673>make<s%> our <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H7673>cease<s%> <S%H1115>from<s%> <S%H3372>fearing<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.
Therefore we <S%H559>said<s%>, Let us now <S%H6213>prepare<s%> to <S%H1129>build<s%> us an <S%H4196>altar<s%>, not for burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%>, nor for <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%>:

But that it may be a <S%H5707>witness<s%> between <S%H1755>us<s%>, and you, and our generations <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H5647>us<s%>, that we might do the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him with our burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%>, and with our <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%>, and with our peace <S%H8002>offerings<s%>; that your <S%H1121>sons<s%> may not <S%H559>say<s%> to our <S%H1121>sons<s%> in time to <S%H4279>come<s%>, You have no <S%H2506>part<s%> in the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

Therefore <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H559>we<s%>, that it shall be, when they should so say to us or to our <S%H1755>generations<s%> in time to <S%H4279>come<s%>, that we may <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H7200>again<s%>, Behold the <S%H8403>pattern<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, which our <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%>, not for burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%>, nor for <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%>; but it is a witness between us and <S%H5707>you<s%>.

God <S%H2486>forbid<s%> that we should <S%H4775>rebel<s%> against the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and <S%H7725>turn<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%> from <S%H310>following<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, to <S%H1129>build<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> for burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%>, for food <S%H4503>offerings<s%>, or for <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%>, beside the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> that is <S%H6440>before<s%> his <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%>.

And when <S%H6372>Phinehas<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, and the <S%H5387>princes<s%> of the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> and <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H505>thousands<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> which were with <S%H8085>him<s%>, heard the <S%H1697>words<s%> that the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%>, it pleased <S%H3190>them<s%>.

And <S%H6372>Phinehas<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%>, and to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%>, and to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>, This <S%H3117>day<s%> we <S%H3045>perceive<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is <S%H8432>among<s%> <S%H4603>us<s%>, because you have not committed this <S%H4604>trespass<s%> against the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>: <S%H227>now<s%> you have <S%H5337>delivered<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

And <S%H6372>Phinehas<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, and the <S%H5387>princes<s%>, <S%H7725>returned<s%> from the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%>, and from the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%>, out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>, unto the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>, to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and <S%H7725>brought<s%> them <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%>.

And the <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H3190>pleased<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>, and did not <S%H559>intend<s%> to go <S%H5927>up<s%> against them in <S%H6635>battle<s%>, to <S%H7843>destroy<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> where the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> and <S%H1410>Gad<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> <S%H5707>Ed<s%>: for it shall be a witness between us that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is <S%H430>God<s%>.
